name: "Everything Can't Make You Happy" - assumed the Being
name_original: "Everything Can't Make You Happy" - assumed the Being
description:
A Short Bitsy Game about perspective and simple pleasures. (Not to forget those blips when you deny yourself those pleasures!)  

WASD to move.
SPACE to continue dialogue.

Or simply swipe and tap with your phone.

My first try at using Bitsy.

Let me know your thoughts!
